mensajeDeBienvenida: Welcome to our budgeting and financial health app! Here you can keep track of your finances and improve your financial situation. Sign up now and start achieving your financial goals!
laContraseñaDebeTenerAlMenos8Caracteres: Password must be at least 8 characters.
laContraseñaDebeContenerAlMenosMayuscula: Password must contain at least one uppercase and one lowercase letter.
elAñoDebeSerValido: Year of birth must be a valid year.
